data.rationale:
I've been getting nastygrams about my use of the root namespace. I
    suggest putting some of my modules in jdb:: for now.

    xsub is a cheap Inline::C replacement list is a library of list
    functions vm is a library including mmap, malloc, memcpy, etc.

    Do I have to fill this out to use jdb::?
